about_the_game:
Dive into the enchanting world of Cat Fusion Quest, a delightful and addictive puzzle game where the goal is to combine adorable cats to create even more charming and powerful feline friends! Strategically align three or more cats in lines to watch them merge into new and stronger breeds. How far can your cat power reach? But be careful – plan your moves wisely to avoid running out of possible combinations.

Features:

- Charming Graphics: Enjoy beautifully designed cats and smooth animations that bring the feline world to life.
- Challenging: Test your skills
- Relaxing Soundtrack: Enjoy a soothing and relaxing soundtrack that enhances the gaming experience.
- Progressive Difficulty: Requiring strategic thinking and careful planning.

Cat Fusion Quest is perfect for cat lovers and puzzle enthusiasts alike. Immerse yourself in this whimsical world and see how powerful your cat kingdom can become!

name: Cat Fusion Quest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
